details.description: Contact Student Finance England - phone number, address, complaints and student finance appeals
details.body:
Contact details for Student Finance England including complaints, appeals and the European Services Team.

Parents and partners need the student’s consent before Student Finance England can give them information - the student can give consent when they apply or at a later date.

Student finance complaints

If you have a complaint contact the Student Loans Company.

Download ‘How to make a complaint’ (PDF, 146KB)

Student Loans Company

customer_complaints@slc.co.uk
Telephone: 0845 073 8908

Student finance appeals

You can appeal a decision about the amount and type of student finance you get. Download the form and send it by email or post.

Download ‘Student Finance England - appeals form’ (PDF, 74KB)
